alert.note: Alert for Boone; Platte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:20AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Platte and southern Boone Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 320 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Primrose, or 11 miles west of Albion, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cedar Rapids around 330 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Edward. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
